trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section that provides full control over the messaging stack for the user.
trans-unit.target: 表示組態區段，為使用者提供對於訊息堆疊的完整控制權。

trans-unit.source: Custom bindings provide full control over the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] messaging stack.
trans-unit.target: 自訂繫結上提供的完整控制權[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]訊息堆疊。

trans-unit.source: An individual binding defines the message stack by specifying the configuration elements for the stack elements in the order they appear on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 個別繫結定義訊息堆疊的指定組態項目堆疊項目在堆疊出現的順序。

trans-unit.source: Each element defines and configures the one element of the stack.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目定義，及設定堆疊的一個項目。

trans-unit.source: There must be one and only one transport element in each custom binding.
trans-unit.target: 各個自訂繫結必須只有一個傳輸項目。

trans-unit.source: Without this element, the messaging stack is incomplete.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這個項目，訊息堆疊就不完整。

trans-unit.source: The order in which elements appear in the stack matters, because it is the order in which operations are applied to the message.
trans-unit.target: 項目堆疊中出現的順序很重要，因為它是作業套用至訊息的順序。

trans-unit.source: The recommended order of stack elements is the following: 1.
trans-unit.target: 建議的堆疊項目順序如下所示︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Transactions (optional) 2.
trans-unit.target: （選擇性） 2 的交易。

trans-unit.source: Reliable Messaging (optional) 3.
trans-unit.target: 可信賴傳訊 （選擇性） 3。

trans-unit.source: Security (optional) 4.
trans-unit.target: 安全性 （選擇性） 4。

trans-unit.source: Transport 5.
trans-unit.target: 傳輸 5。

trans-unit.source: Encoder (optional)
trans-unit.target: 編碼器 （選擇性）

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.CustomBindingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.CustomBindingElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.CustomBindingElement"></xref> class with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.CustomBindingElement"></xref>具有指定名稱的類別。

trans-unit.source: A unique name for the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 繫結項目的唯一名稱。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的項目加入至這個組態區段。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement"></xref> to be added.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement"> </xref>加入。

trans-unit.source: element is or empty.
trans-unit.target: element是或空白。

trans-unit.source: The message encoding configuration element already exists in the binding.
trans-unit.target: 訊息編碼組態項目已經存在繫結中。

trans-unit.source: -or- The stream upgrade element already exists in the binding.
trans-unit.target: -或者-繫結中的資料流升級項目已經存在。

trans-unit.source: -or- The transport element already exists in the binding.
trans-unit.target: -或者-傳輸項目已經存在繫結中。

trans-unit.source: Applies the content of the specified binding to this binding configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 指定的繫結的內容套用至這個繫結組態項目。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: A binding.
trans-unit.target: 繫結。

trans-unit.source: binding is or empty.
trans-unit.target: binding是或空白。

trans-unit.source: The type specified by binding is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 所指定之類型 binding 無效。

trans-unit.source: -or- The stream upgrade element already exists in the binding.
trans-unit.target: -或者-繫結中的資料流升級項目已經存在。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new behavior element to this section and returns a value indicating if the operation is successful.
trans-unit.target: 將新的行為項目加入至這個區段，並傳回值，指出作業是否成功。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement"></xref> to be added.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement"> </xref>加入。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果作業成功。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: element is or empty.
trans-unit.target: element是或空白。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a close operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定供關閉作業完成其作業的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the close operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定必須逾時前完成關閉作業的時間長度。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Called when the content of a specified binding element is applied to this binding configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 指定的繫結項目的內容套用至這個繫結組態項目時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A binding.
trans-unit.target: 繫結。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of time provided for an open operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定供開啟作業完成其作業的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the open operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定必須逾時前完成開啟作業的時間長度。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref>包含集合的執行個體<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>可能是屬性的物件或<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>這個組態項目的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"> </xref>包含集合的執行個體<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>可能是屬性的物件或<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>這個組態項目的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a receive operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定供接收作業完成的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the receive operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定必須逾時前完成接收作業的時間長度。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a send operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定供傳送作業完成的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定傳送作業已逾時前完成的時間長度。</xref:System.TimeSpan>
